org.odk.collect.android.utilities

Class FormDefCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.odk.collect.android.utilities.FormDefCache

  • public class FormDefCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Methods for reading from and writing to the FormDef cache

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static org.javarosa.core.model.FormDef readCache(java.io.File formXml)
      If a form is present in the cache, deserializes and returns it as as FormDef.
      static void writeCache(org.javarosa.core.model.FormDef formDef, java.lang.String formPath)
      Serializes a FormDef and saves it in the cache.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • writeCache

        public static void writeCache(org.javarosa.core.model.FormDef formDef,
                              java.lang.String formPath)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Serializes a FormDef and saves it in the cache. To avoid problems from two callers trying to cache the same file at the same time, we serialize into a temporary file, and rename it when done.
        Parameters:
        formDef - - The FormDef to be cached
        formPath - - The form XML file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readCache

        public static org.javarosa.core.model.FormDef readCache(java.io.File formXml)
        If a form is present in the cache, deserializes and returns it as as FormDef.
        Parameters:
        formXml - a File containing the XML version of the form
        Returns:
        a FormDef, or null if the form is not present in the cache
